lintersMap.description: keys (String) are glob patterns, values (Array<String> | String) are commands to execute.

globOptions.description: micromatch options to customize how glob patterns match files.

concurrent.description: Controls if linters are run simultaneously for each glob pattern.

chunkSize.description: Max allowed chunk size based on number of files for glob pattern. This option is only applicable on Windows based systems to avoid command length limitations

globOptions.description: micromatch options to customize how glob patterns match files.

linters.description: keys (String) are glob patterns, values (Array<String> | String) are commands to execute.

ignore.description: array of glob patterns to entirely ignore from any task.

subTaskConcurrency.description: Controls concurrency for processing chunks generated for each linter. This option is only applicable on Windows. Execution is not concurrent by default.

relative.description: If true it will give the relative path from your package.json directory to your linter arguments.
